subject: re:Online store offers special discounts
body:
Dear valued member.
You have an excellent opportunity to save money purchasing your products.
MyCanadianPharmacy on-line drug store provides quality pharmaceutical products to help you manage your health and well-being without spending heaps of money.

Best regards,Sofia Chung
